description: Gets information for the specified stage session.

parameters.name: stageArn
parameters.description: ARN of the stage for which the information is to be retrieved.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: ID of a session within the stage.

nested_items.name: stageSession
nested_items.description: The stage session that is returned.

nested_items.name: sessionId
nested_items.description: ID of the session within the stage.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: ISO 8601 timestamp (returned as a string) when this stage session began.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: ISO 8601 timestamp (returned as a string) when the stage session ended. This is null if the stage is active.
